name: Pork Chop Gravy
description: Savor the delicious combination of tender pork chops smothered in rich gravy, served over fluffy white rice.
instructions: 1. Season pork chops with salt, black pepper, paprika, and thyme.
2. In a large skillet, melt butter over medium-high heat. Add pork chops and sear until golden brown on both sides. Remove chops from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, add diced onion and minced garlic. Saut√© until fragrant and translucent.
4. Sprinkle all-purpose flour over the onions and garlic. Stir and cook for a minute to form a roux.
5. Gradually whisk in beef broth and heavy cream until the mixture thickens into a smooth gravy. Season with salt, pepper, and additional thyme to taste.
6. Return the seared pork chops to the skillet and simmer in the gravy for about 15-20 minutes until the chops are cooked through and tender.
7. While the chops simmer, prepare white rice according to package instructions.
8. Serve the pork chops and rich gravy over a bed of fluffy white rice.
9. Garnish with fresh parsley if desired.
10. Enjoy your hearty Pork Chop Gravy with Rice!
